purpose: The email announces the Call for Papers for the IEEE Artificial Intelligence x Software Engineering (AIxSE) conference scheduled for October 1-3, 2025, in Laguna Hills, California. It highlights the significance of AI in enhancing software engineering practices and invites authors to submit manuscripts in various formats. The email outlines the topics of interest, submission guidelines, and important deadlines for paper submissions and workshop proposals. It also mentions that accepted papers will be considered for inclusion in IEEE Xplore and for awards.

conf_name_candidates.evidence: Subject:     IEEE AIxSE 2025 Call for Papers

evidence_sentences: IEEE Artificial Intelligence x Software Engineering (aka AIxSoftware)
Authors are invited to submit an 8-page (regular), 4-page (short), and 2-page (poster and demo) manuscript in double-column IEEE format.

TOPICS OF INTEREST include all aspects of SE that may be assisted by AI, such as: Software design, Requirements engineering, Automatic programming, Software development, Software testing, Software maintenance.
Accepted papers will be submitted for inclusion into IEEE Xplore subject to meeting IEEE Xploreâ€™s scope and quality requirements.
IMPORTANT DATES: Workshop Proposals Deadline: July 22, 2025 PT, Paper Submission Deadline: July 15, 2025 PT (Extended Deadline), Paper Acceptance: August 1, 2025 PT.
